text: Koraa, ‘he manara! Tomaloke yadi mora dbina samparke sandeha posana karaa tente jani thoraa! Tomaloke allahara bahirae yisakalara ibadata karaa ma'i sihamtara ibadata nakarao. Baram ma'i ibadata karao allahara yijane tomalokaka mrtyu pradana karae arau ma'i adista haicho ye ma'i yate muminasakalara antarbhukta ha'om’
